name: word_sorting

samples.input: Sort the following words alphabetically: List: oven costume counterpart

A: credulity hypochlorite phone ponderosa

Q: Sort the following words alphabetically: List: newt arson parthia seismography mugho aspect census
A: arson aspect census mugho newt parthia seismography
